a b s t r a c t
Cr-doped Li 9 V 3−x Cr x (P 2 O 7 ) 3 (PO 4 ) 2 (x = 0.0–0.5) compounds have been prepared using sol–gel method.
The Rietveld refinement results indicate that single-phase Li 9 V 3−x Cr x (P 2 O 7 ) 3 (PO 4 ) 2 (x = 0.0–0.5) with trig-
onal structure can be obtained. Although the initial specific capacity decreased with Cr content at a lower
current rate, both cycle performance and rate capability have excited improvement with moderate Cr-
doping content. Li 9 V 2.8 Cr 0.2 (P 2 O 7 ) 3 (PO 4 ) 2 compound presents the good electrochemical rate and cyclic
ability. The enhancement of rate and cyclic capability may be attributed to the optimizing particle size,
morphologies, and structural stability during the proper amount of Cr-doping (x = 0.2) in V sites.
